item.title: Potto Need Water
item.description: Transmit water to our lovely Potto. Make him growth even more bigger and stronger plant. The entry for Global Game Jam 2018. jam site: https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/potto-need-water gameplay: https://youtu.be/qRjH79JLIxw responsible: AI of Potto, UI Logic
